Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '19-1, this is Skyking. Do you copy?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without a word, Watanabe turns off the radio. Squad 19-1 is still MIA.'}
{3: 'After retaking the Titan Trench and the hangar passageway, Squadron 20 now has a better firing position, and Squadron 19 has a smoother attack route.'}
{3: "They've managed to reclaim 40% of the K-44 defensive works, and the rest is only a matter of time."}
{3: 'Not counting the enemies still putting up resistance in the residential area, things are going quite smoothly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'According to my calculations, if the number of enemies is correct, Squadrons 20 and 19 should hold on their own.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "True. But Squads 19 and 20 aren't the kind to mess up... Something's wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'However, our priority should be to clear out the residential area up ahead.', 4: '1'}
